column3: NACK, sorry. I do not think it is worth to touch this (the reasoning is all written in #5925).\n

How about we rename MAX_MONEY to AMOUNT_OVERFLOW_PROTECTION_THRESHOLD? Can
we do then stop discussing the precise semantics of the maximum money
constant?
Fully agree with @sipa, couldn't have worded it better.\n
@sipa Sounds great. Please refer to #6197 for implementation.\n
